safe_documents.title: Employee Onboarding Guide
safe_documents.chunk: Welcome to Acme Corp! This guide covers your first 90 days, including setting up your workstation, meeting your team lead, and completing mandatory compliance training modules.

safe_documents.title: API Design Best Practices
safe_documents.chunk: Use RESTful conventions for endpoint naming. Always version your APIs (e.g., /api/v2/). Implement rate limiting at the gateway level. Return proper HTTP status codes: 200 for success, 400 for client error, 500 for server error.

safe_documents.title: Q4 Sales Report
safe_documents.chunk: Revenue grew 23% year-over-year reaching $4.8M in Q4 2025. Key growth drivers included enterprise subscription upgrades and APAC market expansion. Customer churn decreased to 2.1%.

safe_documents.title: Machine Learning Pipeline Architecture
safe_documents.chunk: The feature engineering stage transforms raw data into model-compatible tensors. We use scikit-learn's Pipeline class with custom transformers for missing value imputation, categorical encoding, and feature scaling.
